steps.step: Prepare to enter Ihram, a spiritual state of purity and devotion. This includes washing your body and changing into Ihram clothing, preferably at a miqat station outside the holy city.

dua.name: Talbiyah
dua.translation: Here I am at your service O Allah, (in response to Your call), here I am. Here I am at Your service and You have no partners. Verily all praise, grace and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partners.

steps.step: Recite the Talbiyah in the miqat station to declare intention to make the pilgrimage
Proceed to Makkah and perform Tawaf al-Qudum (Tawaf of Arrival) around the Kaaba in Masjid al-Haram.
Perform the Welcome Tawaf, enter Al Haram (Holy Mosque) and circle the Holy Kaaba seven times in a counterclockwise direction.

dua.name: Dua of Tawaf
dua.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
dua.english: Bismillahi, wa-s-salatu wa-s-salamu 'ala Rasulillah, Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika
dua.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.

steps.step: Travel to Mina 5km away, by walking or by bus, after morning prayer in Makkah.
Spend the day in prayer.
Spend the night in tents.
Travel to Arafat 20km away.
Stand and pray (wuquf) in Arafat Plain or Jabal Al Rahma (Mount Arafat). Do not leave the boundary or the Hajj will be invalid.

dua.name: Dua of Arafat
dua.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
dua.english: La ilaha illallah, wahdahu la sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa huwa 'ala kulli shai'in qadir
dua.translation: There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.

steps.step: At sunset, travel to Muzdalifah to collect pebbles for the next day.
Spend the night under the stars.
Prepare to enter Ihram, a spiritual state of purity and devotion. This includes washing your body and changing into Ihram clothing, preferably at a miqat station outside the holy city.

dua.name: Talbiyah
dua.translation: Here I am at your service O Allah, (in response to Your call), here I am. Here I am at Your service and You have no partners. Verily all praise, grace and sovereignty belong to You. You have no partners.

steps.step: Recite the Talbiyah in the miqat station to declare intention to make the pilgrimage
Proceed to Makkah and perform Tawaf al-Qudum (Tawaf of Arrival) around the Kaaba in Masjid al-Haram.
Perform the Welcome Tawaf, enter Al Haram (Holy Mosque) and circle the Holy Kaaba seven times in a counterclockwise direction.

dua.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
dua.english: Bismillahi, wa-s-salatu wa-s-salamu 'ala Rasulillah, Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlika
dua.translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.

Spend the day in prayer.
